## Data

These are the famous Iris data, collected by Edgar Anderson.

## Irises

![Iris Species](iris-species.png){width=50%}

![Petals and Sepals](petal-sepal.png){width=50%}

## Regression

```{r}

lm(Petal.Length ~ Sepal.Length + Sepal.Width, data = iris)

```

## Regression Demo

```{r}
#| message: false

library(rgl)

library(car) # companion to applied regression

options(rgl.useNULL = TRUE) # suppress separate RGL window.

data("iris")

car::scatter3d(x = iris$Sepal.Length,
               y = iris$Petal.Length,
               z = iris$Sepal.Width,
               xlab = "Sepal Length",
               ylab = "Petal Length",
               zlab = "Sepal Width")

rglwidget()

```
